CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1950, pg. 2, reads: "Coronation Highlight - Rochester High School varsity football letterman recently elected Ray Whittington and Gloria Puryear, 'King and Queen of Football' for the year. The regal honorees were crowned in appropriate ceremonies at the annual football dance held not long ago at the school. The 'King' and 'Queen' and their 'court' are, left to right, Eugene Matecook, Catherine Ferrara, attendant; Miss Puryear, Whittington, also a guard on this years team: Theresa Halahan, attendant, and Kenneth Heckle. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rochester High School students, from left: Eugene Matecook, Catherine Ferrara, "Queen" Gloria Puryear, "King" Garfield Whittington wearing no. 32 football jersey crowning Puryear, Theresa Halahan, and Kenneth Heckle, at football dance
